meanings.sent1: The superhero displayed ultrahuman strength when lifting the car.
meanings.sent2: The robot's ultrahuman speed allowed it to complete tasks in seconds.
meanings.sent3: The ultrahuman agility of the acrobat amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrahuman memory was like a computer storing endless data.
meanings.sent5: The alien's ultrahuman intelligence was unmatched in the galaxy.

meanings.definition: A being with abilities or characteristics surpassing those of a normal human.
meanings.sent1: The comic book featured an ultrahuman with incredible powers.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the DNA of an ultrahuman to understand its abilities.
meanings.sent3: The ultrahuman in the movie could fly without wings, making everyone envious.
meanings.sent4: The CEO was like an ultrahuman in business, always making the right decisions.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the ultrahuman spread far and wide, inspiring many.
